contentList.content: Goblin

Goblins occupy an uneasy place in a dangerous world, and they react by lashing out at any creatures they believe they can bully. Cunning in battle and cruel in victory, goblins are fawning and servile in defeat.
You are a little Goblin. Short and stout.
Fey Ancestry

You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against being Charmed, and on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against ending the Charmed effect.
Adorable Squirrel
Adorable little critter.
A Baby Squirrel
It doesn't seem capable of much yet. Maybe once it grows a little.
A Friendly Squirrel
A Friend
A Good Friend
My Bestest Friend
Goblin Head 1
Goblin Head 2
Goblin Head 3
Goblin Head 4
Goblin Head 5
Goblin Head 6
A Large Acorn
Feed Your Bestie
Feed Friend
Your bestie absolutely loves these, what a treat.
Heals and satiates your squirrel friend's appetite.
Go Nuts
Give in to the squirrel's base instincts to increase your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> by [1] and possibly make nearby creatures <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FEARED">Fearful</LSTag>.
Go Nuts
The squirrel is enraged! <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> increased by [1].
Leap at a target to bite it and knock it <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Mighty Flight
Bone Septum
Find Best Friend
Call upon your best friend, she'll come running! You can use this trait once per day, regaining one use when you finish a long rest.
Darkvision
Fury of the Small
Speak with Beasts

Through sounds and gestures you can communicate simple ideas with beasts. Dankwood goblins love animals and often keep squirrels, badgers, rabbits, moles, woodpeckers, and other creatures as beloved pets.
Goblin Trait Charge
Nimble Escape

When you damage a creature with an attack or a spell and the creature’s size is larger than yours, you can cause the attack or spell to deal extra damage to the creature. The extra damage equals your proficiency bonus.
You can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of your turns.
Amount of times you can use your goblin racial ability.
You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, regaining all expended uses when you finish a long rest, and you can use it no more than once per turn.
Ol' Shiny
Both shunned and adored by his kind for his magical prowess, this elderly Goblin seeks a new life of adventure and wonder!
You 'n I, we're the same, I will bite your ears clean off and shove them. Down. Your. Gob!
Take the north path, kin. It winds ya 'round, sure as sunshine, 'til you reach the Towers.
Remove yourself from my presence, kin, or pay the price.
Go on. I ain't gonna hold up a goblin.
Well! Look who's gettin' dragged back. And by such familiar company! How badly did you mess up?
Ragzlin's drow friend won't be happy to hear that.
Lil gobshite.
True Soul kin.
Careful, cousin. That drum's for callin' backup.
A fine entrance, cousin, but we got orders. Lads, intruder!
Ah, kin, you weren't supposed to touch that.
Well played, cousin! Shame you just raised the alarm.
Your, erm, sod off, cousin.
Shove over, Klaw! Goblin comin' through.
I figgered a goblin would know the broken road!
Oi, stand back cousin! Where'd you come from?
I'm in a hurry. I have an important message from the boss.
I-I-I didn't realise. Very sorry, True Soul. Very sorry.
Welcome cousin. Had some intruders a while back - can't be too careful.
Then Minthara arrived. And now you - the Absolute's keen on goblins, seems like.
Like Priestess Gut and Boss Ragzlin. Gods, we even got a goblin. Two, countin' you.
Our kind usually don't deal with Boss Ragzlin and Priestess Gut directly.
Then Minthara arrived. And now you - the Absolute's keen on goblins, seems like.
Between all of us, we're swimmin' in goblin. Go ahead, I'm sure the drow's expectin' you.
I gots an audience with Minthara, cousin.
I gots an audience with the one 'n charge, sister.
I could tame ya to be a worg, if I wanted to. I don' really want to.
Didn't expect to see a goblin in here. Did the boss lady send you to rescue me?
Guessin' you're after Minthara. Could be 'er lackey by the looks of you.
Greenskin Goblin

A subterranean folk, early goblins served in the court of the Queen of Air and Darkness, one of the Feywild’s archfey. Goblins thrived in her dangerous domain thanks to a special boon from her—a supernatural knack for finding the weak spots in foes larger than themselves and for getting out of trouble. Goblins brought this fey boon with them to worlds across the Material Plane, even if they don’t remember the fey realm they inhabited. Now many goblins pursue their own destinies, escaping the plots of both archfey and gods.
Dankwood Goblin

Dankwood goblins are much like any other run-of-the-mill goblin but they are much more gentle and artistic than the savage and uncouth goblins of the world. They are inquisitive and have a magical bond with the small forest creatures with which they are often friends. They are fast and numble and love to explore. Because of this they make great adventurers and guides.
